text: @Mike_Pence “Sanctity of human life.” That’s a good one. What anout@the many thousands dying from Covid-19 because of the Trump administrations mishandling of this pandemic? What about the multitude of kids locked in cages in the southwest? Aren’t their lives precious, too? You hypocrites.
